original_text: For, lo, I will call all the families of the kingdoms of the north, saith the Lord; and they shall come, and they shall set every one his throne at the entering of the gates of Jerusalem, and against all the walls thereof round about, and against all the cities of Judah.
korean_text: 내가 북방 왕국들의 모든 족속들을 부를 것인즉 그들이 와서 예루살렘 성문 어귀에 각기 자리를 정하고 그 사방 모든 성벽과 유다 모든 성읍들을 치리라 여호와의 말이니라

sentences.original_text: I will call all the families of the kingdoms of the north
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 북방 왕국들의 모든 족속을 부르리라

sentences.original_text: and they shall set every one his throne
at the entering of the gates of Jerusalem
and against all the walls thereof round about
and against all the cities of Judah
